document_data.name: ''Ring of Trobriand''
document_data.creator: [[Trobriand]]
document_data.mainbody: A '''''ring of Trobriand''''' was a [[magic]] [[ring]] that allowed the wearer to communicate with [[scaladar]].
document_data.Powers: While wearing a ''ring of Trobriand'' the wearer was able to issue mental commands to scaladar. The [[magic]] of these rings only worked upon scaladar that were associated with the ring during its creation.
